entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
